description: This manifest type launches a url into a view. It points to a json endpoint that contains settings for the view such as the url, name and other view options.
This manifest type launches a url into a view. It accepts the settings for the view such as the url, name and other view options inline.
This manifest type launches a url into a Classic Window with no layout support. It points to a json endpoint that contains settings for the window such as the url, name and other window options.
This manifest type launches a url into a Classic Window. It accepts the settings for the window such as the url, name and other window options inline.
This manifest type launches a url into the default Desktop Browser.

This manifest type launches one or more windows with one or more views/urls. It points to a json path that contains a the information used to describe the layout. The common/public/snapshots folder has examples.
This manifest type launches an OpenFin application. It points to a json path that contains the description of an OpenFin app.
This manifest type launches an external app by providing a path or an app asset that has been defined for this platform. It requires the LaunchExternalProcess and Download Asset permissions.
